application.doc: Verify Gateway configuration for a reverse proxy instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: POST
method.id: Verify Gateway configuration for a reverse proxy instance
method.doc: This RESTful web service is used to add Verify Gateway specific configuration to an existing reverse proxy instance. The reverse proxy configuration file is modified, and HTTP Transformations are created.

Changes
Reverse proxy configuration file stanzas and entries: [http-transformations]: verify_gateway_request = verify_gateway_request.xsl verify_gateway_response = verify_gateway_response.xsl [http-transformations:verify_gateway_response]: request-match = response:POST /v2.0/factors*
MMFA is disabled: [http-transformations:verify_gateway_request]: request-match = request:POST /v1.0/endpoint/default/token * request-match = request:POST /v1.0/endpoint/default/revoke * request-match = request:GET /v2.0/Users* request-match = request:POST /v2.0/Users/authentication * request-match = request:GET /v1.0/authnmethods* request-match = request:POST /v1.0/authnmethods* request-match = request:GET /v2.0/factors* request-match = request:POST /v2.0/factors*
MMFA is enabled: [http-transformations:verify_gateway_request]: request-match = request:POST /v1.0/endpoint/default/token * request-match = request:POST /v1.0/endpoint/default/revoke * request-match = request:GET /v2.0/Users* request-match = request:POST /v2.0/Users/authentication * request-match = request:GET /v1.0/authnmethods* request-match = request:POST /v1.0/authnmethods* request-match = request:GET /v1.0/authenticators/* request-match = request:POST /v1.0/authenticators/* request-match = request:GET /v2.0/factors* request-match = request:POST /v2.0/factors*

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: junction
param.doc: AAC junction point to include in the HTTP Transformation rules. Default is /mga

param.name: mmfa
param.doc: A flag indicating whether the MMFA endpoints should also be mapped.
